news.title: 特朗普签署行政令威胁对与伊朗贸易国加征关税
news.title0: Trump threatens tariffs for countries trading with Iran
news.content: 美国总统特朗普签署行政令，威胁对继续与伊朗进行贸易的国家加征额外关税，以施压伊朗核问题。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has signed an executive order threatening to impose additional tariffs on countries that continue to trade with Iran.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大四名工程系学生涉爆炸物及枪支被捕
news.title0: Motive unclear after Canada engineering students charged in explosives case
news.content: 加拿大四名工程系学生因涉嫌持有爆炸物和枪支被捕，警方称其动机尚不明确，仍在调查中。
news.content0: Four Canadian engineering students have been arrested, suspected of possessing explosives and firearms, though police say their motives are unclear as they continue to investigate.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国殡仪馆老板因虐待近200具尸体被判40年
news.title0: Colorado funeral home director sentenced to 40 years for corpse abuse
news.content: 美国科罗拉多州一家殡仪馆的老板因不当存放近200具腐烂尸体，并向家属提供虚假骨灰，被判处40年监禁。
news.content0: The co-owner of a Colorado funeral home where nearly 200 decaying bodies were found has been sentenced to 40 years in prison for corpse abuse.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 警方调查新线索以寻找失踪主播母亲
news.title0: Police investigating new message in search for mother of Savannah Guthrie
news.content: 美国警方正在调查一条发送给当地电视台的新信息，该信息可能与新闻主播萨凡纳·格思里母亲的疑似绑架案有关。
news.content0: Police are investigating a new message sent to a local TV news station that might be linked to the suspected abduction of the mother of US news presenter Savannah Guthrie.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 卫星图像显示伊朗正修复导弹与核设施
news.title0: Iran Is at Work on Missile and Nuclear Sites, Satellite Images Show
news.content: 卫星图像分析显示，伊朗正快速修复去年遭袭的弹道导弹设施，但对主要核设施的修复进展有限。
news.content0: Iran appears to have rapidly repaired several ballistic missile facilities damaged in strikes last year, but it has made only limited fixes to major nuclear sites struck by Israel and the United States, a New York Times analysis of satellite imagery suggests.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 数学家探讨人工智能对数学领域的挑战
news.title0: These Mathematicians Are Putting A.I. to the Test
news.content: 随着人工智能的崛起，数学家们正探讨AI是否会取代人类在数学领域的核心地位及其对学科“魔力”的影响。
news.content0: A few weeks ago, a high school student emailed Martin Hairer, a mathematician known for his startling creativity. The teenager was an aspiring mathematician, but with the rise of artificial intelligence, he was having doubts. “It is difficult to understand what is really happening,” he said. “It feels like every day these models are improving, and sooner rather than later they will render us useless.”
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 优步因司机性侵案被判赔偿850万美元
news.title0: Uber must pay $8.5 million in driver sexual assault case, jury says. Here’s what it could mean for thousands of similar cases
news.content: 美国一陪审团裁定，优步公司因其司机强奸乘客需赔偿850万美元，此案可能为数千起类似索赔案设定先例。
news.content0: A jury found that Uber must pay $8.5 million to a woman who said one of its drivers raped her. The decision could set the stage for payments to thousands of other passengers who filed similar claims against the rideshare company.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 风暴“莱昂纳多”致西葡逾1.1万人撤离
news.title0: Storm Leonardo forces more than 11,000 in Spain and Portugal to evacuate their homes
news.content: 风暴“莱昂纳多”带来的连续强风和暴雨袭击西班牙和葡萄牙，已导致至少1.1万人被迫撤离家园，并造成人员死亡。
news.content0: A 'storm train' of consecutive winds and rains battering Spain and Portugal has already forced 11,000 people to flee their homes.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 印度“植树奶奶”萨鲁马拉达逝世，享年约113岁
news.title0: Saalumarada Thimmakka Dies; Planted and Nurtured Thousands of Trees
news.content: 印度环保先驱萨鲁马拉达·蒂玛卡逝世，她因无法生育而将悲伤转化为行动，在七十多年间种植并照料了数千棵树。
news.content0: Saalumarada Thimmakka, an Indian farm laborer who transformed her grief over being unable to conceive children into one of her country’s most enduring environmental legacies, planting and tending thousands of trees, died on Nov. 14 in Bengaluru, also known as Bangalore, the capital of the southern Indian state of Karnataka. She was believed to be 113.
news.author: NYTimes
